name: Rethoric
headline: LinkedIn content creation & strategy for B2B founders
description:
Rethoric is a plug-and-play content team specialized in helping founders publish high-quality content consistently and grow on LinkedIn. 

Most founders know the value of building an audience on LinkedIn, but the process demands consistency, time, creativity, writing skills, and energy‚Äîthings founders often lack.

Founders just need to attend content interview sessions and we do the rest.

founders.name: Eduardo Mussali, Founder
founders.description: Founder-led LinkedIn content/growth for B2B founders

# LinkedIn growth on autopilot
We help founders and execs publish content that drives growth.
Backed by [Y Combinator](http://rethoric.com/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/companies/rethoric>)

## How it works
Step 1‍
Join an Interview Session
We extract your insights, lessons, experiences, and stories into optimized social-media-ready content.
Step 2‍
Approve Batches
World-class human writers & editors create all your content. You receive 2-week content batches for review with unlimited revisions.
Step 3‍
Real-Time Collaboration on Slack
Your dedicated Account Manager is always available via Slack for instant communication. Whether it's sharing ideas or brainstorming sessions, they‚Äôll work with you like a full-time member of your team.
Step 4‍
Daily Strategic Engagement
Your dedicated Community Manager will engage daily with relevant posts to boost your content distribution and enhance your online presence.
![Examples icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e9f8974649bb51a748e826/670f1b41b78deb5be6f81294_Rethoric_Icons_2.png)
## Real examples
For purposes of confidentiality, client details are obscured.*real engagement metrics

Rethoric is an intimate extension of your brand‚Äîyour goals, beliefs, and the things that you stand for. The team encapsulates a powerful example of what happens when you pair founders with human beings who are deeply invested in telling their story. The world moves on stories, it was a pleasure to let Rethoric tell mine. From the interviews to the support on community engagement, it is your voice amplified with the firm backing of an expert team who goes to great lengths to know and champion your story.
Rethoric Client
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e9f8974649bb51a748e826/66e9f8974649bb51a748e8f4_star-60.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e9f8974649bb51a748e826/66e9f8974649bb51a748e8f4_star-60.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e9f8974649bb51a748e826/66e9f8974649bb51a748e8f4_star-60.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e9f8974649bb51a748e826/66e9f8974649bb51a748e8f4_star-60.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e9f8974649bb51a748e826/66e9f8974649bb51a748e8f4_star-60.png)
Working with Rethoric has been an absolute pleasure. Their dedication to delivering high-quality work is evident in every project, and they consistently go above and beyond to ensure client satisfaction. The team‚Äôs attention to detail and commitment to excellence have made them a valuable partner, and I couldn‚Äôt be more impressed with the content. Highly recommend!

## Benefits of Founder-led content
### Save On Your Time
Focus on building your business.
![Magnet icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e9f8974649bb51a748e826/670f169def9f3b82200f1250_Rethoric_Icons_-31.png)
### Fundraise Easier
Attract engaged VC interest.
### Amplify Your Voice
Become an industry authority.
### Build Credibility
Be the go-to expert in your niche.
### **See Tangible ROI**
Spend less on customer acquisition.
### **Aquire More Customers**
Drive sales on autopilot.
![FAQ icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e9f8974649bb51a748e826/671adaf9da193f971d8e31cb_Rethoric_Icons_4.png)
## Frequently Asked Questions
If you still have a question, chances are you'll find the answer below.
What do you help me with?
You might be struggling to find time to research, write, and publish content regularly. Maybe you're not as active online as you would like to be? Perhaps you would like to engage with your audience more? Working with us, we handle the heavy lifting of content creation and strategy, so you can focus on what you do best: growing your business.
How do you ensure the content reflects my unique voice and style?
Our process starts with a deep-dive discovery session to understand your voice, tone, and style. We analyze your previous writings and engage in detailed discussions to capture your unique perspective. Our professional writers then craft content, which is fine-tuned through your feedback, ensuring it authentically represents you.
Do you provide strategy and consultation on content distribution and amplification?
Yes, we offer strategic advice on content distribution and amplification. Our team can guide you on best practices for sharing your content across platforms and leveraging your network to maximize reach and engagement. We can also assist with more advanced strategies, such as paid promotion and partnerships.
How quickly can I expect to see results from my thought leadership content?
While the impact of thought leadership content builds over time, many of our clients start seeing increased engagement and recognition within the first few months. Consistency is key, and as your content library grows, so does your influence and the measurable outcomes from your thought leadership efforts.
How do you handle confidentiality and intellectual property?
Confidentiality and the protection of your intellectual property are paramount. We sign a non-disclosure agreement (NDA) at the outset of our engagement. All content created for you is your intellectual property, and we ensure complete confidentiality throughout the process.
Are refunds available?
While we don't offer refunds due to the custom nature of our content, we prioritize your satisfaction. If any content doesn't meet your expectations, we're committed to making it right with revisions. Plus, our flexible subscription allows you to pause or cancel anytime if your needs change.
How much of my time will this service require?
We respect how valuable your time is. After our initial discovery session, we only require about 45 minutes of your time every other week to review and approve content. Our streamlined process is designed to keep your time commitment minimal while ensuring your content strategy remains robust and effective.
What if I‚Äôm not satisfied with the content provided?
We strive for your complete satisfaction. If the content doesn't meet your expectations, we offer revisions. We work closely with you to understand your concerns and make necessary adjustments until you feel the content accurately reflects your message and meets your standards.
Why not hire a full-time copywriter?
Good question! For starters, the annual cost of a full-time senior-level copywriter now exceeds $100,000, plus benefits (and good luck finding a good one). Aside from that, you may not always have enough work to keep them busy at all times, so you're stuck paying for time you aren't able to utilize. 
How do you stay up-to-date with industry trends to ensure relevant content?
Our team continuously monitors industry news, trends, and insights. We also run client interviews with YOU; you're the industry expert, our job is to restructure, repackage and distribute your insights to an internet audience.
What makes your service different from other content creation or ghostwriting services?
Our service is uniquely tailored to tech founders, focusing on thought leadership and industry influence. Unlike generic content creation services, we combine deep industry knowledge with a personalized approach to capture your voice and amplify your vision, all while ensuring a minimal time investment on your part.
What happens if I want to pause or cancel the service?
We understand that your needs may change. Our service is flexible, allowing you to pause or cancel ‚Äì no questions asked. We're here to support your journey, whether that means adapting our services to fit your evolving requirements or pausing our collaboration until you're ready to resume.
You'll just end up using AI?
Nope. AI is a fantastic tool‚Äìwith powerful capabilities‚Äìbut it lacks finesse. Most of its output is generic and bland, tailored for the average audience. BORING! Working with Rethoric, you are guaranteed 100% access to the brains and keyboards of our expert ghostwriters (who are not AI.)

## Frequently Asked Questions
If you still have a question, chances are you'll find the answer below.
What do you help me with?
You might be struggling to find time to research, write, and publish content regularly. Maybe you're not as active online as you would like to be? Perhaps you would like to engage with your audience more? Working with us, we handle the heavy lifting of content creation and strategy, so you can focus on what you do best: growing your business.
How do you ensure the content reflects my unique voice and style?
Our process starts with a deep-dive discovery session to understand your voice, tone, and style. We analyze your previous writings and engage in detailed discussions to capture your unique perspective. Our professional writers then craft content, which is fine-tuned through your feedback, ensuring it authentically represents you.
Do you provide strategy and consultation on content distribution and amplification?
Yes, we offer strategic advice on content distribution and amplification. Our team can guide you on best practices for sharing your content across platforms and leveraging your network to maximize reach and engagement. We can also assist with more advanced strategies, such as paid promotion and partnerships.
How quickly can I expect to see results from my thought leadership content?
While the impact of thought leadership content builds over time, many of our clients start seeing increased engagement and recognition within the first few months. Consistency is key, and as your content library grows, so does your influence and the measurable outcomes from your thought leadership efforts.
How do you handle confidentiality and intellectual property?
Confidentiality and the protection of your intellectual property are paramount. We sign a non-disclosure agreement (NDA) at the outset of our engagement. All content created for you is your intellectual property, and we ensure complete confidentiality throughout the process.
Are refunds available?
While we don't offer refunds due to the custom nature of our content, we prioritize your satisfaction. If any content doesn't meet your expectations, we're committed to making it right with revisions. Plus, our flexible subscription allows you to pause or cancel anytime if your needs change.
How much of my time will this service require?
We respect how valuable your time is. After our initial discovery session, we only require about 45 minutes of your time every other week to review and approve content. Our streamlined process is designed to keep your time commitment minimal while ensuring your content strategy remains robust and effective.
What if I‚Äôm not satisfied with the content provided?
We strive for your complete satisfaction. If the content doesn't meet your expectations, we offer revisions. We work closely with you to understand your concerns and make necessary adjustments until you feel the content accurately reflects your message and meets your standards.
Why not hire a full-time copywriter?
Good question! For starters, the annual cost of a full-time senior-level copywriter now exceeds $100,000, plus benefits (and good luck finding a good one). Aside from that, you may not always have enough work to keep them busy at all times, so you're stuck paying for time you aren't able to utilize. 
How do you stay up-to-date with industry trends to ensure relevant content?
Our team continuously monitors industry news, trends, and insights. We also run client interviews with YOU; you're the industry expert, our job is to restructure, repackage and distribute your insights to an internet audience.
What makes your service different from other content creation or ghostwriting services?
Our service is uniquely tailored to tech founders, focusing on thought leadership and industry influence. Unlike generic content creation services, we combine deep industry knowledge with a personalized approach to capture your voice and amplify your vision, all while ensuring a minimal time investment on your part.
What happens if I want to pause or cancel the service?
We understand that your needs may change. Our service is flexible, allowing you to pause or cancel ‚Äì no questions asked. We're here to support your journey, whether that means adapting our services to fit your evolving requirements or pausing our collaboration until you're ready to resume.
You'll just end up using AI?
Nope. AI is a fantastic tool‚Äìwith powerful capabilities‚Äìbut it lacks finesse. Most of its output is generic and bland, tailored for the average audience. BORING! Working with Rethoric, you are guaranteed 100% access to the brains and keyboards of our expert ghostwriters (who are not AI.)

generated_description:
### Rethoric: Your LinkedIn Content Partner

Founded in 2021 and backed by Y Combinator's W21 batch, **Rethoric** is primed to tackle a common struggle among B2B founders: creating consistent, engaging content for LinkedIn. Operating out of sunny San Diego, California, this small but mighty team of six helps founders elevate their online presence without draining their time and creativity.

**The Mission:** Rethoric revolves around simplifying LinkedIn content strategy and creation for busy founders and executives. They understand the value of audience building on LinkedIn, but they also know that crafting high-quality content daily is no small feat. Time, energy, and writing skills are prerequisites that many founders simply don‚Äôt have.

**How It Works:** The process is refreshingly straightforward:
1. **Content Interview Sessions**: Founders participate in interviews that extract their insights and stories.
2. **Content Creation**: The Rethoric team‚Äîcomprising seasoned writers and editors‚Äîbuilds tailored content.
3. **Collaboration**: Through a dedicated Slack channel, founders can collaborate, share ideas, and provide feedback on the content drafts.
4. **Community Engagement**: Rethoric‚Äôs community managers actively engage with relevant posts to amplify content distribution and interaction.

**Benefits of Partnering with Rethoric:**
- **Time Savings**: Founders can focus on scaling their businesses while Rethoric handles content production.
- **Enhanced Credibility**: Establish yourself as a thought leader and industry expert.
- **ROI**: Experience tangible returns by driving sales through expertly crafted content.
- **Flexible Engagement**: With a simple approval process every two weeks, your commitment remains minimal.

**Client Testimonials:** Founders who have worked with Rethoric rave about their diligence and the high standards of quality they uphold. Many describe them as an extension of their brand‚Äîone that understands their voice and story.

**The Rethoric Advantage:** Unlike hiring a full-time writer‚Äîwhich can be costly and inefficient‚ÄîRethoric provides a dedicated team that blends expertise with personalized service. Clients leverage their insights while avoiding the burdens of constant content creation.

If you‚Äôre a founder looking to boost your LinkedIn presence and share your story effectively, Rethoric might just be the strategic partner you‚Äôve been searching for. Check out their website at [rethoric.com](http://rethoric.com) to find out more or to set up a call.
